title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: was slightly waterdamaged, replaced parts r3880, r3881, c3880, r5079, c4905, r5413  as all of them were looking pretty bad with only one side being still attached. went from no fan spin to quarter spin. nothing else looks damaged. what causes a quarter fan spin?

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message:
Voltage on PPBUS_G3H??
Resistance between pin 17-18 and 27-28 from ISL6259??

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: g3h 3.47 and im seeing 0 on all the pins

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: g3h on c7085 is 0

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: Read #2 again. What is G3H? PPBUS can't be 0 as the board would be totally dead.

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message:
ppdcin_g3h measured on pin 1 of c7085 is giving me 16.8 
voltage on pin 28 is 16.24 measured on pin 1 of c7020
voltage on pin 27 is 16.24 measured on pin 2 of c7020
voltage on pin 17 is 12.59 measured on pin 1 of c7050
voltage on pin 18 is 12.59 measured on pin 2 of c7050

sorry cable came unpluged when i moved it

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message:
I asked you [COLOR=#FF0000]PPBUS_G3H[/COLOR] voltage and resistance between pins 17-18 and 27-28 not voltage, anyway....

According to the values you give, you should have 12.59V on F7040 wich is ok..

I guess PP3V3_S5 is present.. PP5V_S3 is high for a second while fan spin???

Water damage around SPI and or SMC???

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: Is voltage coming high on L7510 for a second?

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: yes pp5v_s3 is high for just a second when it starts to spin, i checked l7510 nothing it sits at 0v threw fan spin, and yes there was a bit of corrosion down by the smc,

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: Could be corrosion under SMC, remove the glue around it, absolutely all!! Put some flux and apply heat, better if you can make SMC dance, practice on donor board first!!....

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: R7402 is also suspect. Also check ALL_SYS_PWRGD is pulsing high.

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: reflow of smc did not change it. r7402 is fine. ALL_SYS_PWRGD spikes up when the fan turns on to around 3.5v but goes right back to 0v

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: ALL_SYS_PWRGD is going down because some power rail is not coming high, it's on you to find which one...

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: thats one thing im a little mixed up on, what is the order of the rails? power states? ALL_SYS_PWRGD gets its power from the pp3v3 s0 rail, does that mean its last to start or the first to start. sorry if its a stupid question. ive watched the videos over and over where he explains it. but i still get confused

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: As long as ALL_SYS comes on for a second all power rails are good. Clock chip is the next suspect.

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: when you say clock chip your talking about the smc correct?

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message:
SMC = SMC = U4900

clock chip = clock chip = U2800

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: ok upon checking the clock chip i get power to pins 2 and 13 correctly, but pins 5,6 only get power for a second as the fan spins up. thoes come from the PP3V3_ENET ive searched all the way up to Q7922 and the signal starts for one sec then dies

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: Have you tried replacing U2800?

title: [SOLVED]quater fan spin 820-2936
message: nice! that is why your the man. figured something b4 the clock was bad since it dropped charge b4 the clock chip. but sure enough replaced the chip and its boting
